content.raw: Hello, Im a bit confused about the name of the robot. Based on the wiki and the images on the wiki, the robot is referred to as R5, but I have always seen the robot called Valkyrie in various articles and around the internet? Is this the Valkyrie robot or is it a different robot? Or does the R5 software also run the Valkyrie robot so both names are found in the documentation?
